result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Lars G Miller

defendant.name: Miller, Lars G
defendant.address: 303 W Messenger St, Rice Lake, WI 54868

records.addlTxt:
Case called at 9:52 AM. Hearing held via Zoom and in person.
 Defendant Lars G Miller not in court.  Attorney David W. Field in court for Lars G Miller.  Prosecuting Attorney Matthew Z Kirkpatrick in court for the State of Wisconsin. 
Clerk notes that the Defendant is currently at Racine Correctional but they are not answering the video or telephone calls.
Court orders the matter adjourned.
Hearing scheduled for December 8, 2022 at 09:30 am.

(Case called at 9:32 AM- by Zoom) Defendant Lars G Miller appeared by video, in custody.  Attorney David W. Field in court separately.  Prosecuting attorney Tiffany M. Winter in court for the State of Wisconsin. 
Defense indicates that he is seeking an adjournment so he can speak with the Defendant. Discussion held with Defendant regarding scheduling. 
Hearing: 10/25/2022 at 9:30 AM.

10:20 AM case called. Prosecuting attorney Kelly Ronquist in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Lars G Miller appeared by video, in custody (Racine).  Attorney David W. Field in court for Lars G Miller.
Hearing scheduled for September 15, 2022 at 09:30 am.

(Case called at 9:33 AM) Prosecuting attorney Kelly Ronquist in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Lars G Miller not in court.  Attorney David W. Field in court for Lars G Miller. 
Defense indicates the Defendant is in custody at Dodge Correctional- requests new date. 
Hearing: 07/11/2022 at 9:30 AM. 
Off the record- Defendant appears in custody from Dodge Correctional. New date provided to Defendant.

9:44 AM case called. Prosecuting attorney Andrew James Gunderson in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Lars G Miller appeared by video from Dodge County.  Attorney David W. Field in court for Lars G Miller.
Hearing scheduled for May 31, 2022 at 09:30 am.

9:30 AM case called and held via Zoom. Prosecuting attorney Matthew Z Kirkpatrick appeared in court for the State of Wisconsin, Defendant Lars G Miller appeared by video, in custody, Attorney David W. Field for Lars G Miller appeared in court.
Hearing scheduled for April 21, 2022 at 09:30 am.

Order denying request to postpone.
Per the Court, the Return Hearing scheduled for 03/14/2022 at 9:30 a.m. will stay on the calendar.
Defendant's Pre-Trial Conference Indication to postpone.

(11:09 AM case called.) Prosecuting attorney Kelly Ronquist appeared in court for the State of Wisconsin. Defendant Lars G Miller appeared by video, in custody in the Eau Claire County Jail. Attorney Sonia L Anderson appeared by phone for Lars G Miller. 
Defendant acknowledges receipt of the complaint and waives time limits for preliminary hearing.
Pre-Trial Conference (by phone) with District Attorney's Office (715-839-4828) on February 21, 2022 at 1:15 pm.
Hearing scheduled for March 14, 2022 at 09:30 am.

Conditions:
Defendant to maintain absolute sobriety.
Defendant not to consume/possess any alcohol or go into any taverns, bars, liquor stores/place where alcohol primarily is served/sold.

*Defendant refused to sign.*
